# Lightfoot (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]] 

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 132

*You mutter the words of this short spell and dive down the hallway, dancing between the armed guards and out the gate*.

You provoke no attacks of opportunity when moving.
